name: Police in Reverse TrafficJam
description:
Game made for "Weekly Game Jam - Week 96". Controls:

Position the cursor and press left mouse button - to "horn" with siren :)

The siren color is the circle half red - half blue.

 If you want to move away a car just horn near that car.. taking care of the color of the siren and color of the car.

I think that's it!

Good luck and enjoy!
